Package Sokoban.game.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Sokoban.game.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class, contains logic for movement and gameEnding

  • Method Details

    • getGameOver

      public boolean getGameOver()
      Gets gameOver boolean
      Returns:
      the gameOver boolean

    • setGameOver

      public void setGameOver(boolean gameOver)
      Sets gameOver boolean
      Parameters:
      gameOver - the value to set gameOver to

    • move

      public void move(Board board, int x, int y) throws Exception
      Moves the character accordingly (prevents illegal movement), reloads board, checks for gameEnding
      Parameters:
      board - the game board
      x - the value of how far horizontally to move, getting value from key-input: left = -1, right = 1
      y - the value of how far vertically to move, getting value from key-input: down = -1, up = 1
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - for the case of a movement going (on) out of map
      NullPointerException - for the case of the map not getting loaded (correctly)
      Exception - basic Exception

    • getGameOver

      public void getGameOver(int x, int y, Block[][] map, Board board) throws Exception
      Checks if Eye is stuck (surrounded by more than one obstacle) and if so, triggers gameOver
      Parameters:
      x - value for adjusting player position horizontally
      y - value for adjusting player position vertically
      map - the built map
      board - the game board
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - for the case of movement going (on) out of map
      Exception - basic Exception

    • eyesOnPortalCheck

      public boolean eyesOnPortalCheck(Block[][] map) throws Exception
      Checks if objects (eyes) are on target space (portal)
      Parameters:
      map - the 2d array as the map
      Returns:
      boolean which indicates if all eyes are on targeted position
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - for the case map doesn't load (correctly)
      Exception - basic Exception
